name: kysely-pg-client
author: Joseph T. Lapp <arachnojoe@gmail.com>
description: Non-pooling single-connection Postgres dialect for Kysely, thoroughly tested

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules & rm -rf dist & rm -rf test/current/dist & rm -rf test/latest/dist
scripts.build: rm -rdf dist && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && pnpm write-packages
scripts.test: npm run build && rm -rdf test/current/dist && tsc -p test/current && DIALECT=postgres mocha --timeout 15000 'test/current/dist/**/*.test.js'
scripts.build:latest: rm -rdf dist && tsc && npx check-synced-code --config=test-sync.latest.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json
scripts.test:latest: npm run build:latest && rm -rdf test/latest/dist && npx load-kysely-tests --config=test-sync.latest.json && tsc -p test/latest && DIALECT=postgres mocha --timeout 15000 'test/latest/dist/**/*.test.js'
